content:
Hi all, I've done a write-up on the comparisons of the backbone element Practitioner.Role and the top level resource PractitionerRole so that we can discuss and make a choice as to what we would like to see moving forward.
https://brianpos.wordpress.com/2016/10/16/practitioner-role-vs-practitionerrole/

@Brian Postlethwaite Where would you like comments to be posted? The security WG has some advice from the long history of Role-Based-Access-Control (not that we are expecting to use the FHIR mechanism, but simply management experience).
